files.patch:
@@ -38,7 +38,18 @@
-Use expand to remove tabs
-expand ${f} > ${f}.tmp
-mv ${f}.tmp $f
-
-Use sed to remove trailing white space
-sed -e 's/[ ]* $//' ${f} > ${f}.tmp
-mv ${f}.tmp $f
+First cd into the libpng folder and run the following scripts.
+
+    Use expand to remove tabs
+        for f in *.c *.h;
+        do
+        expand ${f} > ${f}.tmp;
+        mv ${f}.tmp $f;
+        done
+
+    Use sed to remove trailing white space
+        for f in *.c *.h;
+        do
+        sed -e 's/[ ]* $//' ${f} > ${f}.tmp;
+        mv ${f}.tmp $f;
+        done
+
+Make sure all the updated files have UNIX-STYLE (LF) line endings to avoid
+whitespace errors.
